Name: ApplicationPricing
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false" title="Pricing">
  <models>
    <model id="Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Application_Pricing_Detail__c" orderby="Name ASC">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Payment_Frequency__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Pricing_Method__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Yield_Percent__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Type__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Credit_Rating__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Credit_Rating__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Factor__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Maximum_Financed_Amount__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Selected__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Term__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Payment_Amount_Derived__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Total_Interest__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Header__c"/>
      <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.Description__c"/><field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.End_Date__c"/><field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/><field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.Participation_Percentage_CFA__c"/><field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.Participation_Percentage_Dealer__c"/><field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.Participation_Percentage_Dealer_Subsidy__c"/></fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="genesis__Application__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="highlightSelectedPricing">
              <models>
                <model>Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails</model>
              </models>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="Pricing_Application" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Applications__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="RecordTypeId"/>
        <field id="genesis__Credit_Rating__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Credit_Rating__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Loan_Amount__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="genesis__Total_Score__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Term__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Lock__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="DATE" displaytype="DATE" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Lock_Validity_Period__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Revision_Frequency__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Floor__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Margin__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Maturity_Date__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Rate_Type__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Index_Linked__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Spread__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Index__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__APR__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Pricing_Method__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Base_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Base_Rate__r.Name"/>
        <field id="RecordType.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Product_Type__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Index__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c"/>
        <field id="expectedCloseDate" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>FORMAT_DATE("mm/dd/yy",{{genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="genesis__Credit_Limit__c"/>
        <field id="ShowRefreshButton" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="changeInterestCalculationMethod"/>
            <action type="save">
              <models>
                <model>Pricing_Application</model>
              </models>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Index_Linked__c</field>
            <field>genesis__Interest_Rate_Type__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Pricing_Application" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="TODAY"/>
              </updates>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Rate_Lock__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="save">
              <models>
                <model>Pricing_Application</model>
              </models>
            </action>
            <action type="custom" snippet="calculateInterestRateForApplication"/>
            <action type="requeryModel" model="Pricing_Application" behavior="standard"/>
            <action type="custom" snippet="RegenerateScheduleForInterestInformation"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Interest_Index__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Pricing_Application" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="formula" field="genesis__Interest_Rate__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false">
                  <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{genesis__Margin__c}}), {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}} + {{genesis__Spread__c}}, {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Margin__c}}+{{genesis__Spread__c}}) || IF(ISBLANK({{genesis__Spread__c}}), {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}} + {{genesis__Margin__c}}, {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Margin__c}}+{{genesis__Spread__c}})</formula>
                </update>
              </updates>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Margin__c</field>
            <field>genesis__Spread__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="Pricing_RateScheduleModel" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Rate_Schedule_Setup__c" orderby="genesis__Sequence__c ASC">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Index__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Index__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Margin_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__c"/>

        <field id="genesis__Rate_Type__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Terms__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Unit__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Base_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Start_Date__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Adjustments__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions logic="1 AND 2">
        <condition type="blank" value="null" field="genesis__Application__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="RATE SCHEDULE" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Pricing_Method__c"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="Pricing_SelectedPricingModel" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Application_Pricing_Detail__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Payment_Frequency__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Pricing_Method__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Yield_Percent__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Type__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Credit_Rating__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Credit_Rating__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Factor__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Maximum_Financed_Amount__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Selected__c"/>
        <field id="Selected" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" length="255" label="Selected" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>IF({{genesis__Selected__c}} = True ,'Yes','No')</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="genesis__Term__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.Name"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="genesis__Payment_Amount_Derived__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Margin__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Base_Rate__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions logic="1 AND 2">
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="genesis__Application__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" field="genesis__Selected__c" operator="=" mergefield="Id" novaluebehavior="deactivate" inactive="false" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Pricing_SelectedPricingModel" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="formula" field="genesis__Interest_Rate__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false">
                  <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{genesis__Margin__c}}), {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}} , {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Margin__c}})</formula>
                </update>
              </updates>
            </action>
            <action type="custom" snippet="UpdateInterestRateOfSelectedPricing"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Base_Rate__c</field>
            <field>genesis__Margin__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Rate_Schedule_Setup__c" orderby="genesis__Start_Date__c ">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Index__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Index__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Margin_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.Name"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Type__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Start_Date__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="DATE" displaytype="DATE"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Pricing_Method__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Base_Rate__c"/>
        <field id="InterestRate" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" length="255" label="Interest Rate" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="9" scale="2" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE">
          <formula>{{genesis__Base_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Margin_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Spread__c}}</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="genesis__Spread__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Adjustments__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Header__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Header__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Header__r.Id"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="genesis__Application__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="formula" field="genesis__Interest_Rate__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" sourcemodel="Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel" sourcefield="InterestRate">
                  <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{genesis__Margin_Rate__c}}), {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}} + {{genesis__Spread__c}}, {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Margin_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Spread__c}}) || IF(ISBLANK({{genesis__Spread__c}}), {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}} + {{genesis__Margin_Rate__c}}, {{genesis__Base_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Margin_Rate__c}}+{{genesis__Spread__c}})</formula>
                </update>
              </updates>
            </action>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Pricing_Application" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="modelmerge" field="genesis__Interest_Rate__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" sourcemodel="Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel" sourcefield="genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/>
              </updates>
            </action>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Pricing_UI_Model" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="modelmerge" field="interestRateForRateSchedule" enclosevalueinquotes="true" sourcemodel="Pricing_Application" sourcefield="genesis__Interest_Rate__c"/>
              </updates>
            </action>
            <action type="save">
              <models>
                <model>Pricing_Application</model>
                <model>Pricing_UI_Model</model>
              </models>
            </action>
            <action type="save">
              <models>
                <model>Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel</model>
              </models>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Base_Rate__c</field>
            <field>genesis__Margin_Rate__c</field>
            <field>genesis__Spread__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="populateBaseRateForRateScheduleManual"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>genesis__Index__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>

    </model>
    <model id="Selected_Adjustments" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Adjustment_Rate__c" orderby="genesis__Sequence__c ASC">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Sequence__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Adjustment_Description__c"/>

        <condition type="param" value="id" field="genesis__Application__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>

  <components>
    <wrapper uniqueid="sk-2iQ5-969" cssclass="pricingpagewrapper">
      <components>
        <pagetitle model="Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails" uniqueid="sk-1_Pp-690">
          <maintitle>Loan Information</maintitle>
          <actions>
            <action type="multi" label="Refresh" uniqueid="pricing-refresh-button" icon="fa-refresh">
              <actions>
                <action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
                  <models>
                    <model>Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
                <action type="custom" snippet="showButtonLabelsAsToolTips"/>
              </actions>
              <renderconditions logictype="and">
                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="Pricing_Application" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="ShowRefreshButton" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" value="true"/>
              </renderconditions>
              <enableconditions/>
            </action>
            <action type="multi" uniqueid="pricing-button" label="Generate Pricing" icon="fa-dollar" cssclass="skuid-pricing-button ui-button">
              <actions>
                <action type="custom" snippet="GeneratePricing"/>
                <action type="blockUI" timeout="3000" message="Pricing is getting generated. Please refresh the page in few moments to see the updated values."/>
                <action type="requeryModel" model="Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails" behavior="standard"/>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Pricing_Application" affectedrows="context">
                  <updates>
                    <update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="ShowRefreshButton" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/>
                  </updates>
                </action>
                <action type="custom" snippet="showButtonLabelsAsToolTips"/>
              </actions>
              <hotkeys/>
              <renderconditions logictype="and">
                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="Pricing_Application" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="genesis__Pricing_Method__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" value="RATE CARD"/>
              <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails" sourcetype="userinfo" sourceuserinfotype="profilename" value="System Administrator"/></renderconditions>
              <enableconditions logictype="and">
                <condition type="fieldvalue" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="ApplicationPricing_ApplicationLockStatus" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="RecordStatus" value="true"/>
              </enableconditions>
            </action>
          </actions>
        </pagetitle>

        <tabset rememberlastusertab="false" defertabrendering="true" uniqueid="PricingTabs">
          <tabs>
            <tab name="Pricing Offer">
              <components>
                <deck searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" columngutter=".75em" rowgutter=".75em" model="Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails" filtersposition="top" filterswidth="150px" showsavecancel="false" behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="300px" hideheader="true" hidefooter="false" uniqueid="pricingDetailsDeck" pagesize="25" setmaxwidth="manual" maxwidth="300px">
                  <components>
                    <grid uniqueid="pricingOptionCard">
                      <divisions>
                        <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1" verticalalign="top">
                          <components>
                            <buttonset model="Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails" uniqueid="sk-1-TE-1356" cssclass="buttonSetRS">
                              <buttons>
                                <button type="multi" label="Click here to view details" uniqueid="viewRateScheduleButton">
                                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                                    <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="genesis__Rate_Card_Setup_Detail__r.genesis__Pricing_Method__c" value="RATE SCHEDULE"/>
                                  </renderconditions>
                                  <enableconditions logictype="and">
                                    <condition type="fieldvalue" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="ApplicationPricing_ApplicationLockStatus" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="RecordStatus" value="true"/>
                                  </enableconditions>
                                  <actions>
                                    <action type="requeryModel" model="Adjustments" behavior="standard"/>
                                    <action type="requeryModel" model="Pricing_RateScheduleModel" behavior="standard"/>
                                    <action type="showPopup">
                                      <popup width="90%" title="Rate Schedule">
                                        <components>
                                          <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" showexportbuttons="false" hideheader="true" hidefooter="false" pagesize="10" alwaysresetpagination="false" createrecords="false" model="Pricing_RateScheduleModel" mode="readonly" allowcolumnreordering="true" responsive="false" uniqueid="sk-1-Vr-1769" emptysearchbehavior="query">
                                            <fields>
                                              <field id="genesis__Sequence__c" hideable="true" uniqueid="fi-1-W7-1835"/>
                                              <field id="genesis__Rate_Type__c" hideable="true" uniqueid="fi-1-WJ-1929"/>
                                              <field id="genesis__Base_Rate__c" hideable="true" uniqueid="fi-1FvP-933"/>
                                              <field type="COMBO" hideable="true" uniqueid="fi-2EXM-2822">

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="highlightSelectedPricing" cachelocation="false" url="">
var $ = skuid.$;
var pricingDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails');

var selectedPricingId;
var selectedPricingCard;
$.each(pricingDetailModel.data, function(i,row) {
    var j = i+1;
    selectedPricingCard = document.querySelector("#pricingDetailsDeck > div.nx-editor-contents > div.nx-list > div > article:nth-child(" + j + ")");
    if (pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'genesis__Selected__c')) {
        selectedPricingId = pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'Id');
        selectedPricingCard.style.border = "2px solid #48ce94";//green color
    }
    else {
        selectedPricingCard.style.border = "1px solid #37444e";//off black color
    }
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="GeneratePricing" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');
var appRow = applicationModel.getFirstRow();
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','generatePricing',
                                 {
                                     applicationId : appRow.Id
                                 });

if (!result[0].includes('Generated...')) {
    alert(result);
    var appPricingDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails');
    appPricingDetailModel.updateData();
    return false;
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ApplyPricing" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var pricingDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_ApplicationPricingDetails');

var selectedPricingId;
var selectedCount = 0;
$.each(pricingDetailModel.data, function(i,row) {
    if (pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'genesis__Selected__c')) {
        selectedCount ++;
        selectedPricingId = pricingDetailModel.getFieldValue(row,'Id');
    }
});


var pageTitle = $('#PricingRecommendation');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
if (selectedCount > 1) {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
      {
          message: 'More than one pricing is seleted. Please select only one pricing.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
      },
    ]
    );
    return;
}
var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SelectPricingOnApplication','selectPricingOption',
{
    pricingId : selectedPricingId
});
if (result[0].includes('Error') || result[0].includes('ERROR')) {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
      {
          message: result[0],
          severity: 'ERROR'
      },
    ]
    );
    return false;
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateInterestRate" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var appRSModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel');

var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
var userMargin = appModel.getFieldValue(appRow, 'genesis__Margin__c');

$.each(appRSModel.data, function(i, row) {
    appRSModel.updateRow(row, {
        genesis__Interest_Rate__c : (row.genesis__Base_Rate__c + row.genesis__Margin_Rate__c + userMargin)
    });
});
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateVariableRates" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

/*Making addMonths Function for Javascript*/
Date.isLeapYear = function (year) {
    return (((year % 4 === 0) && (year % 100 !== 0)) || (year % 400 === 0));
};
Date.getDaysInMonth = function (year, month) {
    return [31, (Date.isLeapYear(year) ? 29 : 28), 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31][month];
};
Date.prototype.isLeapYear = function () {
    return Date.isLeapYear(this.getFullYear());
};
Date.prototype.getDaysInMonth = function () {
    return Date.getDaysInMonth(this.getFullYear(), this.getMonth());
};
Date.prototype.addMonths = function (value) {
    var day = this.getDate();
    this.setDate(1);
    this.setMonth(this.getMonth() + value);
    this.setDate(Math.min(day, this.getDaysInMonth()));
    return this;
};


var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
var rateLock = appModel.getFieldValue(appRow, 'genesis__Rate_Lock__c');

var pageTitle = $('#SelectedOfferPage');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c < 0) {
    editor.handleMessages([
       {
          message: 'Rate Floor can not be negative.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
        }
    ]);
    return false;
}
else if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c < 0) {
    editor.handleMessages([
       {
          message: 'Rate Ceiling can not be negative.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
        }
    ]);
    return false;
}
else if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Floor__c > appRow.genesis__Rate_Ceiling__c) {
    editor.handleMessages([
       {
          message: 'Rate Ceiling must be greater than Rate Floor.',
          severity: 'ERROR'
        }
    ]);
    return false;
}

if (appRow.genesis__Margin__c === undefined) {
    appModel.updateRow(appRow, {
        genesis__Margin__c : 0
    });
}

if (rateLock === undefined || rateLock === false) {
    appModel.updateRow(appRow, {
        genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c : undefined,
        genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c : 0,
        genesis__Rate_Lock_Validity_Period__c : 0
    });
}
else if (rateLock === true) {
    if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c !== undefined) {
        if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c < 0) {
            editor.handleMessages([
               {
                  message: 'Rate Lock Period can not be negative.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
                }
            ]);
            return false;
        }
        else if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c !==  undefined && appRow.genesis__Maturity_Date__c !== undefined) {
            var jsDate = skuid.time.parseSFDateTime(appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Date__c);
            var rateLockPeriodEndDate = jsDate.addMonths(appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Period__c);

            if (skuid.time.parseSFDateTime(appRow.genesis__Maturity_Date__c) < rateLockPeriodEndDate) {
                editor.handleMessages([
                   {
                      message: 'Rate Lock Period must not cross the Maturity Date of application.',
                      severity: 'ERROR'
                    }
                ]);
                return false;
            }
        }
    }
    if (appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Validity_Period__c !== undefined && appRow.genesis__Rate_Lock_Validity_Period__c < 0) {
        editor.handleMessages([
           {
              message: 'Rate Lock Validity Period can not be negative.',
              severity: 'ERROR'
            }
        ]);
        return false;
    }
}
</jsitem>

    $ = skuid.$;

var uiModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_UI_Model');
var uiModelRow = uiModel.getFirstRow();

var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
var applicationId = appModel.getFieldValue(appRow, 'Id');

if (uiModelRow.ApplicationUserMargin !== appRow.genesis__Margin__c) {
    skuid.actions.runActionNode(
        skuid.utils.makeXMLDoc(
            '<action type="datasource-action" datasource="salesforce" actionname="apex" sfdcactionname="genesis__AutoGenerateSchedule">' +
                '<inputs>' +
                    '<input name="applicationIds" displaytype="id" value="{{$Model.Pricing_Application.data.0.Id}}"/>' +
                '</inputs>' +
            '</action>'
        )
    );
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateInterestRateForRateSchedule" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var appRSModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_SelectedPricingModel');
var appRow = appRSModel.getFirstRow();
var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application');

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="validateFields">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var pageTitle = $('#PricingRecommendation');

var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
var addressModel  = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_AppRateScheduleModel').data[0];
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('Pricing_Application').data[0];
if(!(addressModel.genesis__Rate_Type__c) )  {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Rate Type Not Selected',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]
    );
    $.unblockUI();
    return false;
}
if( !(addressModel.genesis__Start_Date__c)  )  {
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Start Date Not Selected',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]
    );
    $.unblockUI();
    return false;
}else if((addressModel.genesis__Start_Date__c) && ((addressModel.genesis__Start_Date__c) <= ((applicationModel.genesis__Expected_Close_Date__c)  ))){
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Start Date should be greater than ' +applicationModel.expectedCloseDate,
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]
    );
    $.unblockUI();
    return false;
}

    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="pricingcss" cachelocation="false">
.pricingpagewrapper .nx-editor-header .nx-pagetitle-maintitle {
    margin-left : -15px !important;
}

.buttonSetRS {
    height : 25px;
}
 #viewRateScheduleButton .ui-button-text {
    color: #37444e;
}


#viewRateScheduleButton {
    display : contents !important;
}

#viewRateScheduleButton :hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Tab heading color : off black */
#PricingTabs .nx-template {
    color : #37444e;
}

#PricingTabs > ul {
    background-color : #dddddd;
    outline: none !important;
}

#PricingTabs > ul > li.ui-state-default.ui-corner-top.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-active {
    background-color : #dddddd;
    border-top-color: transparent !important;
    border-right-color: transparent !important;
    border-bottom-color: #2D5074 !important;
    border-left-color: transparent !important;
    outline: none !important;
}
#PricingTabs .ui-tabs-anchor {
    outline: none !important;
}
#PricingTabs > ul > li.ui-state-default.ui-corner-top.ui-state-hover {
    border-top-color: transparent !important;
    border-right-color: transparent !important;
    border-bottom-color: #8ac8ff !important;
    border-left-color: transparent !important;
    outline: none !important;
}

#pricingFieldEditor .nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header, #sk-2Cmp-893 > div > div.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header {
    display: none;
}

#pricingDetailsDeck > div.nx-editor-contents > div.nx-list > div > article:nth-child(n) :hover {
    background-color:#EFFBF5;
    cursor : pointer;
}

/*Popup confirmation height should be limited */
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content {
    min-height: 20px !important;
}

#sk-2EL--2034 > div:nth-child(1) {
    margin-top: 14px;
}

/* align confirmation pop-up buttons to center */
#confirmationButtonSet {
    margin-right:130px;
}

/*Generate Pricing button CSS - $ sign with circular border */
#pricing-button{
    content: "\f09c";
    color:#48CE94 ;
    height: 35px;
    width: 35px;
    border:2px solid #48CE94;
    font-size: 24px;
    background: white;
    vertical-align: top;
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    border-radius: 50%;
    line-height: 30px;
    outline: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: right;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: normal;
    margin-bottom: 3px;
}
#pricing-button > span.ui-button-icon-primary.ui-icon.fa-dollar.sk-icon.inline{
    left: 0.08em;
}
#pricing-button > .ui-button-text {
    display: none;
}


/*Generate Pricing button CSS - $ sign with circular border */
#pricing-refresh-button{
    content: "\f09c";
    color:#48CE94 ;
    height: 35px;
    width: 35px;
    border:2px solid #48CE94;
    font-size: 24px;
    background: white;
    vertical-align: top;
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    border-radius: 50%;
    line-height: 30px;
    outline: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: right;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: normal;
    margin-bottom: 3px;
}
#pricing-refresh-button > span.ui-button-icon-primary.ui-icon.fa-refresh.sk-icon.inline{
    left: 0.08em !important;
}
#pricing-refresh-button > .ui-button-text {
    display: none;
}</cssitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OpenGeocode" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var executionPriority = "1";
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');
var party = partyModel.data[0];
var title = 'Geocode for '+party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;
var appId = party.genesis__Application__c;
var borrowerId;
    if(party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name =='Corporation' || 
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Limited Liability Company' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Partnership' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Association' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Trust' ||
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Government')
    {
         borrowerId = party.clcommon__Account__c;
    }
   else if(party.clcommon__Contact__c && (party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name =='Individual' || 
    party.clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Sole Proprietorship') )
    {
         borrowerId = party.clcommon__Contact__c;
    }else{
        borrowerId = party.clcommon__Account__c;
    }
var retVal = sforce.apex.execute('intframework.IntegrationWebService','getIntegrationUIInformation',{
   integrationFamily :  "Geocoding",
   apiType : "Geocoding",
   executionPriority : executionPriority
});
var jsonObject = JSON.parse(retVal);
var skuidPage= jsonObject.apiSpecificUIPageName;
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&appId=' + appId +'&borrowerId='+borrowerId;
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});

</jsitem>

var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');

var result = sforce.apex.execute('FICOCallout','ficoCalloutMethodForParty',
{
partyId : scRow.Id,
});

});

if(modelToRefresh !== undefined) {
    modelToRefresh.updateData();
}

      <cssitem location="inline" name="CreditDisplay" cachelocation="false">#credit-score-number-view {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: right;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 70px;
}

#credit-score-number-view .credit-score-bg {
    margin: 0 auto;
    font-size: 48px;
    color: white;
    background-color: #48CE94;
    padding-left: 12px;
    padding-right: 12px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 70px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

#credit-score-simple-view {
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 15px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-header,
#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-contents {
    margin: 0;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-item {
    white-space: nowrap;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row {
    height: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    line-height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-value {
    background-color: #7F7F7F;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-type {
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry {
    background-color: #1CBDD4;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 10px;
    padding: 5px 12px;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width: 80%;
    color: white;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field {
    width: 20%;
    text-align: right;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field .nx-fieldtext {
    background-color: white;
    color: #1CBDD4;
    width: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: 700;
}

#credit-score-figure {
    position: relative;
    height: 60px;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    left: 15px;
    bottom: 30px;
    right: 0;
    background-color: red;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar-tick {
    position: absolute;
    height: 25px;
    width: 4px;
    border: 1px solid #7F7F7F;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-number-sm {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #2D5074;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 3px 10px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-bar-wrapper {
    margin-left: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.backgroundColorWhite {
    background-color : white;
}
#jointConsent .nx-editor-header {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 1px;
}</cssitem>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="navigationCSS" cachelocation="false">

#partyDetailPageId .sk-dropnav, div.sk-navigation.sk-navigation-dropdown {
    float: right;
    top: -45px;
    right: 75px;
}

.shift-arrow-to-left{
        padding-right: 40px !important;
}

#partyDetailPageId .ui-button.iconic-button.iconic-button-delete{
    margin-right: auto;
}

                                                                    <contents><strong>Treasury Tip:</strong> The Document tab provides Treasury sales officer the ability to manage documents related to Treasury Opportunity and Treasury Services. The documents can be accessed, overridden, uploaded and deleted using this tab. This tab gives us the information about if the document is required or not, the current status of the document and the documents which are related to different Treasury Services. The Treasury Sales Officer can view different documents and add comments. Different documents can be selected and emailed to the recipients using “Send Email" action. </contents>

            <jsitem location="inline" name="inlineFunction" cachelocation="false" url="">function viewAttachment(attachmentId, docAId, attachName, contentVersion, fileExtension){
    var iframeUrl = '/apex/genesisExtn__previewDocCategory?id=' +attachmentId+'&docAId='+docAId + '&isdtp=vw'
        + '&docConId=' + ((contentVersion === null || contentVersion === undefined) ? 'NULL' : contentVersion)
        + '&fileExtName=' + ((fileExtension === null || fileExtension === undefined) ? 'NULL' : fileExtension);
    openTopLevelDialog({
        title: 'Document Viewer-'+attachName.replaceAll("&apos", "'"),
        iframeUrl: iframeUrl
    });
}


function viewDocument(docuId){
        var title = 'Document Category Details';
        var title = 'Document Category ';
        var skuidPage = 'NewApplicationDocumentCategoryDetails';
        var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&id=' + docuId+'&isDocument='+true;
        openTopLevelDialog({
            title: title,
            iframeUrl: iframeUrl
        });
}

function DeleteAttachment(documentId, parentId, documentName){
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var title = 'Delete ' + documentName.replaceAll("&apos", "'") + '?';
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to Delete this Application Document'
            + ', <strong>\'' + documentName + '\'</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = 'No, do not Delete anything.';
var okText = 'Yes, Delete Application Document'
            + ' \'' + documentName + '\'';

    var okAction = {
        func: 'generateDeleteDocumentMessage',
        parameters: [documentId, parentId]
    };

var value = confirm(title);
    if(value === true) {
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ApplicationDocumentManagement','unLinkAttachment',
            {
                attachmentIds : parentId,
                documentCatId : documentId
            });
        closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({divIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe']});
    }
}</jsitem>
            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RowActionFieldButton" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0];
var value = arguments[1];
var cellElem = field.element;
$ = skuid.$;
cellElem.text();
    var dropdown = document.createElement('div');
        dropdown.setAttribute("class", "dropdown");
        button = document.createElement('button');
        button.setAttribute("class", "dropbtn hoverReady  fa fa-bars");
        area = document.createElement('div');
        area.setAttribute("class", "dropdown-content");
        dropdown.append(button,area);
cellElem.append(dropdown);

var LoadActions = function(){
    if (cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[1].childElementCount !== undefined){
        $(cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[1]).empty();
    }
                titl = 'Actions';
                selecthtml = document.createElement('div');
                selecthtml.setAttribute("class","action rowActionSelect");
                selecthtml.append(titl);
                cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[1].append(selecthtml);
                cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[0].setAttribute("class","actions");
                titl = '';
                selecthtml = document.createElement('div');
                selecthtml.setAttribute("class","arrow");
                selecthtml.append(titl);
                cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[1].append(selecthtml);
                cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[0].setAttribute("class","actions");
    var act = cellElem.parent().parent().find(".sk-action-field");
        skuid.$.each($(act).children(),function(){
                titl = this.title;
                cls = this.childNodes[0].classList[1];
                selecthtml = document.createElement('a');
                selecthtml.setAttribute("class","action"+cls+" rowActionSelect");
                selecthtml.append(titl);
                cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[1].append(selecthtml);
                cellElem[0].childNodes[0].childNodes[0].setAttribute("class","dropbtn hoverDone  fa fa-bars");
        });
};
var RunAction = function(){
    target = event.target.classList[0].substring(6);
    field.element.parent().parent().find("."+target)[0].click();
};

if (value !== undefined ){
    field.element.on('mouseover',".hoverReady",LoadActions);
    field.element.off('click');
    field.element.on('click',"a",RunAction);
}</jsitem>

            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="changeData" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
    var documentModel = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategory');
    var documentAsso =  skuid.model.getModel('DocCategoryAttachmentAsso');
    var documentLink =  skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink');
    var contentVersion = skuid.model.getModel('ContentVersion');
    $( ".nx-list-footer select" ).change(function() {
        if(documentModel !== undefined) {
            documentModel.updateData();
        }
    });
    $('.ui-button.ui-widget.ui-state-default.ui-button-text-only').click(function(){
        if(documentModel !== undefined) {
            documentModel.updateData();
        }
    });
    $('#document-add').prop('title', 'Add');
    $('#saveDoc').prop('title', 'Save');
    $('#cancelDoc').prop('title', 'Cancel');
    $('#openAll').prop('title', 'Expand All');
    $('#closedAll').prop('title', 'Close All');
    $('#syncAll').prop('title', 'Sync Account Documents');
             //making the template field 'relatedTo' open in new tab on click
    $('.relatedTo').each(function (index, value){
        if(value.getElementsByTagName('a')[0] !== undefined){
             value.getElementsByTagName('a')[0].setAttribute('target','_Blank');
        }
    });
    var documetData = documentModel.data[0];
    var myMap = new Map();
    var index;
    var table1 =  document.getElementById('documentCheckList').getElementsByClassName('nx-list-contents');
    if(table1[0]){
        for(var i=0;i<table1[0].offsetParent.tHead.rows[0].cells.length;i++){
            if(table1[0].offsetParent.tHead.rows[0].cells[i].innerText == "File"){
                index = i;
                break;
            }
        }
        $.each(documentAsso.getRows(),function(i,row){
            var array = [];
            if(myMap.get(row.clcommon__Document_Category__c)){
                array= myMap.get(row.clcommon__Document_Category__c);
            }
            array.push(row);
            myMap.set(row.clcommon__Document_Category__c, array);
        });
        var rowsToUpdate = {};
        var count = 0;
        var rowIndex = 0;
        while(table1[0].offsetParent.children[1].children[count] !== undefined) {
            var htmlValue = table1[0].offsetParent.children[1].children[count].children[2].innerHTML;
            var docCatId = htmlValue.substring(htmlValue.indexOf("(")+2, htmlValue.indexOf(")")-1);
            $.each(documentModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
                if(row.Id === docCatId) {
                    var rowdata = table1[0].rows[rowIndex];
                    rowIndex++;
                    if(myMap.get(row.Id)){
                        var linkData = '';
                        var attachedList = myMap.get(row.Id);
                        var cssClass = 'iconic-button iconic-button-delete ui-button ui-widget ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button-text-only';
                        $.each(attachedList,function(i,attachment){
                            var docVer;
                            var fileExtName;
                            $.each(documentLink.getRows(),function(j ,dl){
                                if(dl.Id == attachment.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c) {
                                    $.each(contentVersion.getRows(),function(j ,cv){
                                        if(cv.ContentDocumentId == dl.ContentDocumentId) {
                                            docVer = cv.Id;
                                            fileExtName = cv.FileExtension;
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                            });
                            var div = '<div class="iconic-button iconic-button-delete ui-button ui-widget ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button-text-only" id="document-category-delete" data-rendered="true" role="button" tabindex="0" style="display: inline-block;" title="Delete File" onclick="DeleteAttachment(\''+attachment.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c+'\',\''+ row.Id +'\',\''+attachment.Name.replace(/'/g, "&apos")+'\',)"> </div>';
                            linkData  = (linkData+'<div class="attachment"> <a href="#" onclick="viewAttachment(\''+attachment.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c+'\',\''+ attachment.Id +'\',\''+ attachment.Name.replace(/'/g, "&apos") +'\',\''+ docVer +'\',\''+ fileExtName  +'\')">'+attachment.Name+'</a>').concat(div).concat('</div><br>');
                        });
                        if(rowdata !== undefined && rowdata.cells[index] !== undefined) {
                                rowdata.cells[index].innerHTML = linkData; 
                        }
                    }
                    return false;
                }

            });
            count++;
        }
    documentModel.updateRows( rowsToUpdate );
    }
    
    var modelToRefreshUnlock = skuid.model.getModel("DocumentManagement_ApplicationLockStatus");

            <jsitem location="inline" name="onload" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    var $xml = skuid.utils.makeXMLDoc;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        var documentModel = skuid.model.getModel('DocumentCategory');
        var documentAsso =  skuid.model.getModel('DocCategoryAttachmentAsso');
        var documentLink =  skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink');
        var contentVersion = skuid.model.getModel('ContentVersion');
        $( ".nx-list-footer select" ).change(function() {
            if(documentModel !== undefined) {
                documentModel.updateData();
            }
        });
        $('.ui-button.ui-widget.ui-state-default.ui-button-text-only').click(function(){
            if(documentModel !== undefined) {
                    documentModel.updateData();
            }
        });
        $('#document-add').prop('title', 'Add');
        $('#saveDoc').prop('title', 'Save');
        $('#cancelDoc').prop('title', 'Cancel');
        $('#openAll').prop('title', 'Expand All');
        $('#closedAll').prop('title', 'Close All');
        $('#syncAll').prop('title', 'Sync Account Documents');
                 //making the template field 'relatedTo' open in new tab on click
        $('.relatedTo').each(function (index, value){
            if(value.getElementsByTagName('a')[0] !== undefined){
                 value.getElementsByTagName('a')[0].setAttribute('target','_Blank');
            }
        });
        var documetData = documentModel.data[0];
        var myMap = new Map();
        var index;
        var table1 =  document.getElementById('documentCheckList').getElementsByClassName('nx-list-contents');
        if(table1[0]){
            for(var i=0;i<table1[0].offsetParent.tHead.rows[0].cells.length;i++){
                if(table1[0].offsetParent.tHead.rows[0].cells[i].innerText == "File"){
                    index = i;
                    break;
                }
            }
            $.each(documentAsso.getRows(),function(i,row){
                var array = [];
                if(myMap.get(row.clcommon__Document_Category__c)){
                    array= myMap.get(row.clcommon__Document_Category__c);
                }
                array.push(row);
                myMap.set(row.clcommon__Document_Category__c, array);
            });
            var rowsToUpdate = {};
            $.each(documentModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
                var rowdata = table1[0].rows[i];
                if(myMap.get(row.Id)){
                    var linkData = '';
                    var attachedList = myMap.get(row.Id);
                    var cssClass = 'iconic-button iconic-button-delete ui-button ui-widget ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button-text-only';
                    $.each(attachedList,function(i,attachment){
                        var docVer;
                        var fileExtName;
                        $.each(documentLink.getRows(),function(j ,dl){
                            if(dl.Id == attachment.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c) {
                                $.each(contentVersion.getRows(),function(j ,cv){
                                    if(cv.ContentDocumentId == dl.ContentDocumentId) {
                                        docVer = cv.Id;
                                        fileExtName = cv.FileExtension;
                                    }
                                });
                            }
                        });
                        var div = '<div class="iconic-button iconic-button-delete ui-button ui-widget ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button-text-only" id="document-category-delete" data-rendered="true" role="button" tabindex="0" style="display: inline-block;" title="Delete File" onclick="DeleteAttachment(\''+attachment.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c+'\',\''+ row.Id +'\',\''+attachment.Name.replace(/'/g, "&apos")+'\',)"> </div>';
                        linkData  = (linkData+'<div class="attachment"> <a href="#" onclick="viewAttachment(\''+attachment.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c+'\',\''+ attachment.Id +'\',\''+ attachment.Name.replace(/'/g, "&apos") +'\',\''+ docVer +'\',\''+ fileExtName  +'\')">'+attachment.Name+'</a>').concat(div).concat('</div><br>');
                    });
                    if(rowdata !== undefined && rowdata.cells[index] !== undefined) {
                            rowdata.cells[index].innerHTML = linkData; 
                    }
                }
            });
        documentModel.updateRows( rowsToUpdate );
        }
        
        var modelToRefreshUnlock = skuid.model.getModel("DocumentManagement_ApplicationLockStatus");
        var applicationLock = skuid.model.getModel("NGLoanDashBoard_ApplicationLockStatus");
        
        if(applicationLock !== undefined && modelToRefreshUnlock !== undefined) {
            if (applicationLock.getFirstRow().RecordStatus ) {
                modelToRefreshUnlock.updateRow(modelToRefreshUnlock.getFirstRow(), {
                RecordStatus : true
                });
            }
        }

    });
})(skuid);</jsitem>

            <cssitem location="inline" name="dropDown" cachelocation="false">.dropbtn {

    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: .75rem;
    line-height: 1.875rem;

.dropdown {
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
}

.dropdown-content {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #fff;
    min-width: 122px;
    max-width: 245px;
    z-index: 1;
    border: 1px solid #fff;

.Normal:before {

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var selectedProductModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
            var selectedProductRow = selectedProductModel.data[0];
	        var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + selectedProductRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";
            var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
            var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId },
	             { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: recordsArr[0].Id },
	             { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
	             //Custom Added by Subham starts----
	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}]
	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
	        });
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType},
                         { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
                         //Custom Added by Subham starts----
        	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}
        	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
        	             ]
        	    });
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode == "read"){
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanCLProduct').getFirstRow();
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
var ApplicationOldValues = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationOldValues');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var result = {
'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
'ApplicationOldValues' : ApplicationOldValues,
};

return result;

</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validatePledgeAmount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    var editor = $('#pledge-collateral-title-id ').data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};


var appColRowForPledgeAmt = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation').getFirstRow();
var appColRowForRemainingVal = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation').getFirstRow();
var appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_ApplicationCollateralForPreviousPledgeAmount').getFirstRow();



var pledgeAmt;
var remainingAmt;
var previousPledgeAmt;

if(appColRowForPledgeAmt !== undefined) {
    pledgeAmt = appColRowForPledgeAmt.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c;
}


if(appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt !== undefined) {
    previousPledgeAmt = appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c;
}
if(previousPledgeAmt === undefined) {
    previousPledgeAmt = 0;
}

if(appColRowForRemainingVal !== undefined) {
    remainingAmt = appColRowForRemainingVal.RemainingValue;
    if(isNaN(Number.parseFloat(pledgeAmt))) {
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount should be a number ', 'ERROR');
    }else if(pledgeAmt < 0) {
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount cannot be less than 0 ', 'ERROR');
    } else if(pledgeAmt - previousPledgeAmt > 0 && pledgeAmt - previousPledgeAmt > remainingAmt) {
        /* throw error message; return false */
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount cannot exceed the available appraised value remaining for the collateral ', 'ERROR');
    } else {
        /* return true;*/
        return true;
    }
}

return true;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CreateAppraisalBids" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var appBid = skuid.model.getModel('AppraisalBid');
var appReq = skuid.model.getModel('AppraisalRequest');
var appCol = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
var appAssocn = skuid.model.getModel('AppraisalAssociation') ;

var req = appReq.getFirstRow();
var col = appCol.getFirstRow();


$.each(appAssocn.getRows(),function(i,row){
if(row.genesis__Collateral_Category__r.Name == col.genesis__Collateral__r.clcommon__Collateral_Category__r.Name)
    var bid = appBid.createRow({
         additionalConditions: [
        { field: 'genesis__Appraisal_Request__c', value: appReq.getFieldValue(req,'Id') },
        { field: 'genesis__Status__c', value: 'Pending'},
        { field: 'genesis__Authorized_Appraiser__c', value: row.genesis__Appraiser__c},
         ]
    });


});

var dfd = new $.Deferred();

    $.when(appBid.save())
        .done(function(){
           dfd.resolve();
        })
        .fail(function(){
           dfd.reject();
        });

    return dfd.promise();

 if(!(collValRow.genesis__Application_Collateral__r !== undefined) && appReq.data[1] !== undefined){

 }

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateAppReqRecord" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
    
var appReq = skuid.model.getModel('AppraisalRequest');
var appReqRow = appReq.data[0];

var appColAssocn = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
var appColAssocnRow = appColAssocn.data[0];

var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    var editor = $('#appraisal-request-title-id').data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);
    return false;
};

if(appReq !== undefined) {
    
    if(appReqRow.genesis__Due_Date__c == undefined) {
        return displayMessage('Due Date for the Appraisal Request can not be null. ', 'ERROR');
    }
}

if(!appReqRow){

    var appReqRow = appReq.createRow({
        
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'genesis__Status__c', value:'Pending' },
            { field: 'genesis__Application_Collateral__c', value: appColAssocnRow.Id },
        ]
        
    });

}else{

    appReq.updateRow(appReqRow ,
                        { genesis__Status__c : 'Pending' ,
                          genesis__Application_Collateral__c : appColAssocnRow.Id });

}

var dfd = new $.Deferred();

    $.when(appReq.save())
        .done(function(){
           dfd.resolve();
        })
        .fail(function(){
           dfd.reject();
        });

    return dfd.promise();

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateRemainingValue" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;


var collValModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation');
var collValRow = collValModel.getFirstRow();

var allAppForCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_ApplicationCollateral');
var allAppForCollateralList = allAppForCollateralModel.data;

var total_pledge_amt = 0;

if(allAppForCollateralList !== undefined) {
    /* sum all pledge amount across all application for this collateral */
    $.each(allAppForCollateralList, function(fieldId,appColRow) {
        $.each(appColRow,function(fieldName,val) {
            if ((fieldName != 'attributes') && (fieldName === 'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c')) {
                if(val !== undefined && val !== null) {
                    total_pledge_amt = total_pledge_amt + val;


                }

            }
        });
    });
    if(collValRow !== undefined) {
        /* update remianing value = Appraisaed_Value -Sum(Pledge_Amount across other loan application) */
        collValModel.updateRow(collValRow,{
             RemainingValue: collValRow.clcommon__Appraised_Value__c - total_pledge_amt
        });
    }
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveCollateralLienForApplication" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var applicationCollateralLienPanel = $('#collateralLienPanel');
var editor = applicationCollateralLienPanel.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

var collateralDetailView = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation');
var collateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');

var appCollateralAssociation = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
appCollateralAssociation = appCollateralAssociation.data[0];
for(var key in appCollateralAssociation) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {
        delete appCollateralAssociation[key];
    }
}

var appCollateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralLien');
var appCollateralLienRow = appCollateralLien.data[0];
for(var key in appCollateralLienRow) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {
        delete appCollateralLienRow[key];
    }
}
var lienPosition = appCollateralLienRow.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
var res =true;

if(null==lienPosition || null==appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c || ''==lienPosition || ''==appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c){

    res = false;
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Lien position and amount are required to save lien details.',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]);
    return;
}

if(isNaN(lienPosition) || isNaN(appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c) ) {	
    res = false;	
    editor.handleMessages ([{	
        message: 'Invalid Lien Position/ Lien Amount.',	
        severity: 'ERROR'	},	
    ]);	
    return;	
}	
if(lienPosition<0 || (appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c)<0) {	
    res = false;	
    editor.handleMessages ([{	
        message: 'Lien position and Lien Amount can\'t be negative',	
        severity: 'ERROR'  },	
    ]);	
    return;	
}

if(lienPosition==0){
    res = false;
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Lien position can\'t be 0',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]);
    return;
}

var collateralLiens = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');
var applicationCollaterals = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollaterals');
$.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
    let position = -1;
    if(row.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || row.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
        position = row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    }
    
    
    if(position==lienPosition)
    {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Duplicate Lien Position found!',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        res = false;
    }
});

if(res===true)
{
    try{
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.CollateralLienSaveAndUpdateActions','saveOrUpdateApplicationCollateralLien',{
            appCollLienParams : JSON.stringify(appCollateralLienRow),
            appCollAssociationParams : JSON.stringify(appCollateralAssociation)
       });
       collateralDetailView.updateData();
       collateralLien.updateData();
       applicationCollaterals.updateData();	
    }
    catch(err) {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Unable to save Lien! ' + err,
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
    }

    if (!result.includes('Succesfully saved')){
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Unable to save Lien! ' + result,
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
    }
    else {
         editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Lien saved successfully!',
                severity: 'INFO'
            },
        ]);
        var appliationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
        var appRow = appliationModel.getFirstRow();
        var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeLoanToValueRatio', 'computeLTVandCLTV', { applicationId : appRow.Id,
                                                                                                      paramsMapJson : ''
                                                                                                    });

        if (returnMsg === undefined || !returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                  message: 'Unable to calculate LTV and CLTV : ' + returnMsg[0],
                  severity: 'ERROR'
                }
            ]);
        }
        else {
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                  message: 'LTV and CLTV calculated successfully!',
                  severity: 'INFO'
                }
            ]);
        }
    }
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="rejectDuplicates" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var collateralLienTable = $('#collateralLienTable');
var editor = collateralLienTable.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

var existingLienPositions = [];
var applicationCollateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralLien');
applicationCollateralLien = applicationCollateralLien.data[0];

if(applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
    existingLienPositions.push(applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Lien_Position__c);
}

var collateralLiens = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');
var res =true;
var row_count =1;
var deleteRowCheck;
$.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
    deleteRowCheck=false;
    let applicationLoan;
    if(null!=row.genesis__Application__c){
         if(typeof(row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c) !== 'undefined')        {
            applicationLoan = row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else{
            applicationLoan = 0;
        }
    }else{
        applicationLoan = null;
    }

    // This is to ensure that we are able to delete the newly added empty rows by surpassing the 'Required' functionality of various fields
    let row_element = document.getElementsByTagName('tr')[row_count];
    if(row_element.outerHTML.includes('nx-item deleted')){
        deleteRowCheck = true;
        row.clcommon__Bank__c = 'Dummy Bank';
        row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c = 0.0;
        row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c = 0;
    }

    if(!deleteRowCheck && row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c==0){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Lien position can\'t be 0 or blank',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }


    //Verifying if all the required fields are entered in the rows to be saved/updated (excluding the rows to be deleted)
    if(!deleteRowCheck && (
       typeof(row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c) == 'undefined' ||
       typeof(row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c) == 'undefined' ||
        null==row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c ||
       null==row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c  ||
       row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c == '' || row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c=='' ||
       (applicationLoan == null && row.LoanAmount  == ''))){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: ' Lien Amount, Lien Position and Loan Amount are mandatory fields. Please ensure to enter values for these!',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }
    var lienAmount = ''+row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c;
    var loanAmount = ''+row.LoanAmount;
    var lienPosition = ''+row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    if(isNaN(lienAmount) || isNaN(lienPosition) ){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Invalid format.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }
    if(lienAmount.includes('-') || loanAmount.includes('-') || lienPosition.includes('-')){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Invalid format. Can\'t save negative values.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }


    let position = row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    if(!deleteRowCheck && existingLienPositions.includes(position)){

        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
          {
              message: 'Duplicate Lien Position found!',
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]);
        return
    }
    if(row.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || row.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
        existingLienPositions.push(position);
    }
    
    row_count++;
});
if(res===true){
    $.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
        let loan;
        if(typeof(row.genesis__Application__r)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else if(typeof(row.LoanAmount)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.LoanAmount;
        }else if(typeof(row.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else{
             loan = 0.0;
        }
        collateralLiens.updateRow(row, {
            clcommon__Loan_Amount__c: loan
        });

    });
    collateralLiens.save();
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
          message: 'Collateral Liens updated successfully!',
          severity: 'INFO'
        }
    ]);

    var appliationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
    var appRow = appliationModel.getFirstRow();
    var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeLoanToValueRatio', 'computeLTVandCLTV', { applicationId : appRow.Id,
                                                                                                  paramsMapJson : ''
                                                                                                });
    if (returnMsg === undefined || !returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
              message: 'Unable to calculate LTV and CLTV : ' + returnMsg[0],
              severity: 'INFO'
            }
        ]);
        return false;
    }
    else {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
              message: 'LTV and CLTV calculated successfully!',
              severity: 'INFO'
            }
        ]);
    }
}</jsitem>
