      <jsitem location="inline" name="UpdateSobjectTypeOnLoad" cachelocation="false" url="">
      (function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        // determine sobject type and prefix
        if(skuid.page.params.id){
            getDataFromId();
        } else if(skuid.page.params.sobjecttype){
            getDataFromSobjectType();
        } else {
            skuid.page.params.sobjecttype = 'genesis__Applications__c';
            getDataFromSobjectType();
        }
        // show button labels as icons
        showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
    });

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param id
    function getDataFromId(){
        var sobjectPrefix = skuid.page.params.id.substring(0,3);
        if(sobjectPrefix != undefined) {
            var sobjectType = getSobjectType(sobjectPrefix);
            updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
        }
    }

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param sobjecttype
    function getDataFromSobjectType(){
        var sobjectType = skuid.page.params.sobjecttype;
        if(sobjectType != undefined) {
            var sobjectPrefix = getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType);
            updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
        }
    }

    //create a new row in model to set sobject type and prefix
    function updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix){
      if(sobjectType != undefined && sobjectPrefix != undefined) {
        skuid.$M("GH_AnySObjectModel").createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'SObjectType', value: sobjectType},
                { field: 'Prefix', value: sobjectPrefix},
            ], doAppend: true
        });
      }
    }

    // get sobject name from sobject prefix
    function getSobjectType(prefix) {
        var selectedObjectType;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        if(skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId") != undefined) {
          skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
              if(relatedObject.keyPrefix == prefix){
                  selectedObjectType = relatedObject.objectName;
                  return false;
              }
          });
        }
        return selectedObjectType;
    }

    // get sobject prefix from sobject type
    function getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType) {
        var prefix;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        if(skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId") != undefined) {
          skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
              if(relatedObject.objectName == sobjectType){
                  prefix = relatedObject.keyPrefix;
                  return false;
              }
          });
        }
        return prefix;
    }

})(skuid);
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ManageLoanTeamPopOver" cachelocation="false">
      var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

console.log(' popup session app id :: ' + sessionStorage.selectApplicationId);
var applicationId ;
var treasuryApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('TreasuryApplicationModel');
if(treasuryApplicationModel.data[0]){
    applicationId = treasuryApplicationModel.data[0].Id;
}else{
    applicationId = sessionStorage.getItem('selectApplicationId');
}
var popover = $('.webui-popover')[0];
if (popover && $(popover).is(':visible')) {
    $('.webui-popover').remove();
} else {
    $('#manage-loan-team-members').webuiPopover({
        trigger: 'manual',
        type : 'iframe',
        url: '/apex/skuid__ui?page=LoanTeamMembers&id=' + applicationId,
        width: '620px',
        placement: 'bottom-left',
        closeable: true,
        onShow: function(element) {
                var popover = element[0];
                $(popover).css('bottom', 0);
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content').css('padding', 0);
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('width', '600px');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('height', $(popover).css('height'));
        },
        onHide: function() {
            $('.webui-popover').remove();
        }
    });
    $('#manage-loan-team-members').webuiPopover('show');
}
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="manageLoanTeamCommunication" cachelocation="false">
      var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

console.log(' popup session app id :: ' + sessionStorage.selectApplicationId);
var applicationId ;
var treasuryApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('TreasuryApplicationModel');
if(treasuryApplicationModel.data[0]){
    applicationId = treasuryApplicationModel.data[0].Id;
}else{
    applicationId = sessionStorage.getItem('selectApplicationId');
}

var popover = $('.webui-popover')[0];
if (popover && $(popover).is(':visible')) {
    $('.webui-popover').remove();
} else {
    $('#loan-team-communication').webuiPopover({
        trigger: 'manual',
        type : 'iframe',
        url: '/apex/skuid__ui?page=LoanTeamCommunication&id=' + applicationId,
        width: '820px',
        placement: 'bottom-left',
        closeable: true,
        onShow: function(element) {
                var popover = element[0];
                $(popover).css('bottom', 0);
                $(popover).css('z-index', '999');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content').css('padding', 0);
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').attr('id', 'ltc-popover');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('width', '800px');
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('height', $(popover).css('height'));
                $(popover).find('.webui-popover-content > iframe').css('overflow','hidden');
                $(".close").click(function(){
                    $("#blurBackground").remove();
                });
                if( $('#blurBackground').length < 1){
                    $(".webui-popover-inner").parent().before("<div id='blurBackground' class='ui-widget-overlay ui-front' style='z-index: 100;'></div>");
                }
        },
        onHide: function() {
            $('.webui-popover').remove();
        }
    });
    $('#loan-team-communication').webuiPopover('show');
}
</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OpenPreviewDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
var attachmentRow = skuid.model.getModel('NewAttachmentModel').getFirstRow();
var documentContentRow = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocument').getFirstRow();
var documentContentLink = skuid.model.getModel('ContentDocumentLink').getFirstRow();
var documentContentVer = skuid.model.getModel('ContentVersion').getFirstRow();
var title = attachmentRow === undefined ? (documentContentRow.Title + '.' + documentContentRow.FileExtension) : attachmentRow.Name;

const docAId = skuid.page.params.id
var iframeUrl = '/apex/genesisExtn__previewDocCategory?id=' + (attachmentRow === undefined ? documentContentLink.Id : attachmentRow.Id) 
        +'&docAId='+ docAId + '&isdtp=vw' + '&docConId=' + (documentContentVer === undefined ? 'NULL' : documentContentVer.Id)
        + '&fileExtName=' + (documentContentRow === undefined ? 'NULL' : documentContentRow.FileExtension);
    
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: 'Document Viewer-'+ title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="AddAttachmentsModal" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeleteAttachment" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
var catAssociation = skuid.model.getModel('CatDocAssociation').data[0];
var documentId = catAssociation.clcommon__Attachment_Id__c;
var parentId = catAssociation.clcommon__Document_Category__c;
var documentName = catAssociation.Name;


var title = 'Delete ' + documentName + '?';
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to Delete this Application Document'
      + ', <strong>\'' + documentName + '\'</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = 'No, do not Delete anything.';
var okText = 'Yes, Delete Application Document'
      + ' \'' + documentName + '\'';

var okAction = {
    func: 'generateDeleteDocumentMessage',
    parameters: [documentId, parentId]
};

openTopLevelConfirmation({
      title: title,
      message: message,
      cancelText: cancelText,
      okText: okText,
      okAction: okAction
});</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="SendDocuments">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var appdata = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
var approw = appdata.data[0];

var partyData = skuid.model.getModel('BorrowerModel');
var partyRow = partyData.data[0];
var copartyData = skuid.model.getModel('CoBorrowerModel');
var copartyRow = copartyData.data[0];
try{
    var creditdata = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,genesis__Applications__c,genesis__Fico_Score__c FROM ints__Credit_Report__c WHERE genesis__Applications__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var creditrow = creditdata.getArray("records");
    
    var copartyData = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,clcommon__Account__c,genesis__Application__c,clcommon__Contact__c FROM clcommon__Party__c WHERE genesis__Application__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' AND clcommon__Type__r.Name = 'CO-BORROWER' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var copartyRow = copartyData.getArray("records");
    
    var partyData = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,clcommon__Account__c,genesis__Application__c,clcommon__Contact__c FROM clcommon__Party__c WHERE genesis__Application__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' AND clcommon__Type__r.Name = 'BORROWER' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var partyRow = partyData.getArray("records");
    
    var QuerydataResults = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,APXTConga4__Name__c FROM APXTConga4__Conga_Merge_Query__c ");
    Querydata = QuerydataResults.getArray("records");
    console.log(Querydata);
    
    var templatesdataResults = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,APXTConga4__Name__c FROM APXTConga4__Conga_Template__c ");
    Templatedata = templatesdataResults.getArray("records");
    console.log(Templatedata);
    
    var link1= '/apex/APXTConga4__Conga_Composer?&SolMgr=1';
    var date = new Date();
    var i,
    link2= '&Id='+approw.Id+
               '&QueryId=';
    var len = Querydata.length;
    for(i=0;i<len;i++){
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Application Query')
            link2 += '[AQ]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
       
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Adverse Action Query')
            link2 += ',[ADVACTION]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        
        if(creditrow.length>0 &&  Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Credit Report Query')
            link2 += ',[CREDITSCORE]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+creditrow[0].Id;
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Contact Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[CONTACT]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+partyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COBORROWER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+copartyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Employer Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[EMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)    
                link2 += ',[COEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
        }
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Previous Employer Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[PREEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[PRECOEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
        } 
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Other Source Of Income Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[OTHERINCOME]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COOTHERINCOME]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
        } 
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Outstanding debts'){
            link2 += ',[DEBTS]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Asset Information'){
            link2 += ',[ASSETS]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Driver License Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[BORROWERDL]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COBORROWERDL]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
        }
    }
    for(i=0;i<Templatedata.length;i++){
        if(params.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c == 'Adverse Action notice' &&  Templatedata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Adverse Action Letter - Non Real Estate')
            link2 += '&TemplateId='+Templatedata[i].Id;
        if(params.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c == 'Credit Application' && Templatedata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Consumer Credit Application - Non-Real Estate')
            link2 += '&TemplateId='+Templatedata[i].Id;
    }
    link2 +=  '&SC0=1&SC1=Attachments&DefaultPDF=1&DS7=7';    
    var finallink = link1+link2;
    window.open(finallink);
}catch(Exception){
    alert('Conga is not configured in this org.');
}

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="convert" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];
try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ConvertApplicationCtrl','convertApplicationToContract',
    {
        appId : appRow.Id
    });
    alert(ret);
    if(!ret.includes('Application is converted to contract successfully'))
        return;
    appModel.updateRow(appRow, {genesis__Status__c: 'APPROVED - CONVERTED TO CONTRACT' });
    appModel.save();

    document.getElementById('loan-details-iframe').contentWindow.location.reload(true);
    var arrowEle = document.getElementsByClassName("sk-dropnav-arrow")[0];
            arrowEle.classList.add("shift-arrow-to-right");

} catch(err) {
    alert(err);

}



</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OnLoad" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var contractButton =  document.getElementById('convert-to-contract-button');

    {
        if(contractButton.style.display != "none")
        {
            var arrowEle = document.getElementsByClassName("sk-dropnav-arrow")[0];
            arrowEle.classList.add("shift-arrow-to-left");
        }
    }
      showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
      var applicationData = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication').getFirstRow();
      if(applicationData && applicationData.genesis__Product_Type__c && applicationData.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'PACKAGE'){
          $('#loan-dashboard-parties-section').css('top','0');
          $('#loan-dashboard-parties-section').css('bottom','0');


      }

    // Tab name change based on conditions
    if(applicationData.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'LEASE') {
        $('a[href=#loanID]').text('Lease');
    }
    else if(applicationData.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'PACKAGE') {
        $('a[href=#loanID]').text('Credit Facility');
    }

      var isRecordLocked = skuid.model.getModel('NGLoanDashBoard_ApplicationLockStatus').getFirstRow().RecordStatus;
      var unlockPermission = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationObjectPermission').getFirstRow().PermissionsModifyAllRecords;

      if(typeof(isRecordLocked) != undefined){
            if(typeof(unlockPermission) != undefined){
                if(isRecordLocked == true && unlockPermission == true){
                    $('.shift-arrow-to-left').css('margin-left','-82px');
                }
            }
      }

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="providerOnLoad" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var integrationProvider = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderModel').data;
var providerUIModel = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderUIModel');
$.each(integrationProvider,function(i,row){
    let familyName = row.intframework__Integration_Family__r.Name;
    if (familyName == 'Consumer Credit') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isFicoActive : true
        });
    }else if (familyName == 'UCC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isUCCActive : true
        });
    } else if (familyName == 'Documents And Disclosures') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isDocumentsAndDisclosures : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYCActive : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYB') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYBActive : true
        });
    }  else if(familyName == 'E Sign') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isESignActive : true
        });
	}
		else if(familyName == 'Corporate Information') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isCorporateInformationActive : true
        });
    }
});</jsitem>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="reLoadPolicyCondition" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

//Update Policy Conditions New Page model
var policyConditionsEnhancedModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
if (policyConditionsEnhancedModel !== undefined) {
    policyConditionsEnhancedModel.updateData();
}

setTimeout(function(){ 

    var policyConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
    var policyConditionValue;
    $.each(policyConditionModel.data, function(i, row) {
        var j = i+1;
        policyConditionValue = document.querySelector("#policyTable > div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(" + j + ") > td:nth-child(6) > div > div");
        
        if (policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Exception" ||
        policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Rejected") {
        policyConditionValue.classList.add("red-textbox");//red color
        } else if(policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "In File" ||
            policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Pending" ) {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("amber-textbox");//amber color
        }
        else {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("blue-textbox");//blue color
        }
    });

}, 1000);</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="updateApplicationOnPopup">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__Save_Application}}");

$.blockUI({
    message: message,
    onBlock:function(){
        saveApplication();
    }
});	
function saveApplication(){
    var applicationM = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var applicationData = applicationM.data[0];
    var newAppParams = {};
    var paramsMap = {};
    newAppParams.applicationM = applicationM;
    newAppParams.pmtstreamM = null;
    newAppParams.businessM = null;
    newAppParams.addressM = null;
    newAppParams.personalInfoM = null;
    newAppParams.accountM = null;
    newAppParams.contactM = null;
    newAppParams.changeDate = false;
    newAppParams.generateSchedule = false;
    
    paramsMap.generateSchedule = true;
    paramsMap.AddFeeToLoanAmount = true;
    newAppParams.mapForParameters = paramsMap;
    
    var result = saveNGApplicationV3(newAppParams);
    applicationData.updateApplication = false;
    $.unblockUI();
    location.reload();
}

		<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Launch KYC/KYB" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
 $ = skuid.$;

var appId = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication').data[0].Id;
var title = 'Know Your Customer/Business';
var executionPriority ="1";

var retVal;
if(skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderUIModel').data[0].isKYCActive == true) {
    retVal = sforce.apex.execute("intframework.IntegrationWebService", "getIntegrationUIInformation",{
        integrationFamily :  "KYC",
        apiType : "KYC-Fraud",
        executionPriority : executionPriority
    });
} else {
    retVal = sforce.apex.execute("intframework.IntegrationWebService", "getIntegrationUIInformation",{
        integrationFamily :  "KYB",
        apiType : "Business Instant Id",
        executionPriority : executionPriority
    });
}



var jsonData = JSON.parse(retVal);

var skuidPage = jsonData.apiSpecificUIPageName;
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&id=' + appId;


openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});</jsitem>

message: message,

BookCIFToCore();
}
});	
	
function BookCIFToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCIFCalloutClass','bookToCoreCIFFromBackEnd',
        {
            applicationId : scRow.Id,
        });
    console.log(result);
    if(result == 'Success'){
        BookLoanToCore();
    }
    else{
        alert('Result: ' + result);
    }
}
function BookLoanToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCalloutClass','bookToCoreLoanFromBackEnd',
    {
        applicationId : scRow.Id,
    });
    console.log(result);
    if(result != 'Success'){
        //alert('Result: ' + result);
        return displayMessage(result);
    }
    skuid.model.updateData([scModels],function(){
        $.unblockUI();
    });
}

    background-color: #EBEEF0;
